report.query: SELECT 'REGISTRAZIONI', count(*) AS TOTALE FROM ${OSPITI AREA ATTESA}
SELECT 'NUCLEI FAMILIARI',COUNT(*) AS TOTALE FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ${OSPITI AREA ATTESA} GROUP BY ${OSPITI AREA ATTESA.IDENTIFICATIVO NUCLEO FAMILIARE}) AS subquery
SELECT 'BADGE RILASCIATI',COUNT(*) AS TOTALE FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ${OSPITI AREA ATTESA} GROUP BY ${OSPITI AREA ATTESA.CODICE BADGE}) AS subquery
SELECT 'REGISTRAZIONI', COUNT(*) AS TOTALE FROM ${OSPITI AREA INCONTRO}
